verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים <S%H982><s%> They that trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD כְּֽהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> [shall be] as mount צִיּ֥וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִ֝מּ֗וֹט <S%H4131><s%> [which] cannot be removed לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever יֵשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> [but] abideth

יְֽרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem הָרִים֮ <S%H2022><s%> As the mountains סָבִ֪יב <S%H5439><s%> [are] round about לָ֥הּ וַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> so the LORD סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> [is] round about לְעַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> this וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> from henceforth even for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֪א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָנ֡וּחַ <S%H5117><s%> shall not rest שֵׁ֤בֶט <S%H7626><s%> For the rod הָרֶ֗שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> of the wicked עַל֮ <S%H5921><s%> upon גּוֹרַ֪ל <S%H1486><s%> upon the lot הַֽצַּדִּ֫יקִ֥ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous לְמַ֡עַן <S%H4616><s%> lest לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יִשְׁלְח֖וּ <S%H7971><s%> put forth הַצַּדִּיקִ֨ים <S%H6662><s%> the righteous בְּעַוְלָ֬תָה <S%H5766><s%> unto iniquity יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> their hands

הֵיטִ֣יבָה <S%H2895><s%> Do good יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD לַטּוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> unto [those that be] good וְ֝לִֽישָׁרִ֗ים <S%H3477><s%> and [to them that are] upright בְּלִבּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H3826><s%> in their hearts

וְהַמַּטִּ֤ים <S%H5186><s%> As for such as turn aside עַֽקַלְקַלּוֹתָ֗ם <S%H6128><s%> unto their crooked ways יוֹלִיכֵ֣ם <S%H1980><s%> will lead יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with פֹּעֲלֵ֣י <S%H6466><s%> with the workers הָאָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [but] peace עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> be upon יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> [shall be] upon Israel
